Name: Mexican Nail
Ingredients: 5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Complex with obvious peated whisky and tequila notes, made more interesting with subtle spice and chocolaty notes.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexican Nail contains 204 calories
